(Simplified: 裆)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 當 indicates the sound; 衤 (clothes) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 衤 [ yī ] cloth
    • 當 [ dāng ] appropriate, timely; to act, to serve; the sound of bells
①兩褲腿相連的地方：褲襠。橫襠。直襠。
②兩腿的中間：腿襠。兜襠一腳。
(Simplified: 裆)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 當 indicates the sound; 衤 (clothes) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 裆

Main pronunciation 主要发音: dāng

Original meaning 本义: Meaning crotch of pants.

English senses 英语理解: crotch or seat of pants; pants

Usage example 用法举例: 褲襠 kù dāng (crotch(of trousers) )

襠字的基本解释

襠
dāng
见“裆”。

襠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dāng］
［《廣韻》都郎切，平唐，端。］
“裆1”的繁体字。
(1)衣名。
(2)裤裆。两裤腿相连的地方。

襠字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襠； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1125第37
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?都郞切，音當。【類篇】裲襠，衣名。【釋名】其一當胷，其一當背也。【西京雜記】趙飛燕女弟遺飛燕金錯繡襠。　又【玉篇】袴襠也。【前漢·外戚傳·窮袴註】卽今緄襠袴也。【阮藉·大人先生論】行不敢離縫際，動不敢出褌襠。　又?襠。詳?字註。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　 crotch; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1125 to 37
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? All are cut and sound. [Classes] Crotch, clothing name. [Release name] One is to be a corpse, the other is to be a back. [Xijing Miscellaneous] Zhao Feiyan's daughter's brother left Feiyan with gold embroidered crotch.　[Jade articles] Hakama also. [Previous Han · Biography of Foreign Relations · Poor Hakama Note] This is also a hakama. [Mr. Ruan Ji · On the Lord] I dare not leave the seam, dare not get out of the crotch.　 Again? Crotch.
